resources.string: Light: \nThis activity level is suitable for individuals who engage in light physical activity or exercise occasionally, such as walking or light housework.
Active: \nThis activity level is suitable for individuals who engage in vigorous physical activity or exercise consistently, such as running, intense workouts, or competitive sports.
Moderate: \nThis activity level is suitable for individuals who engage in moderate physical activity or exercise regularly, such as brisk walking, cycling, or recreational swimming.
